altername_name: Campus: Sakura no Mau Naka de
name: Screen
overview: Screen is a classic Japanese first person adventure game in which the player takes the role a young boy in a high school where he will meet different girls and other characters and will advance through the game choosing different answers. The goal of the game is to find love, there are six different girls to meet and they will have different reactions depending of the player answers. The game features beautiful graphics, Japanese voices, multiple endings (depending of the player choices) and a CG gallery and jukebox that will be unlocked playing the adventure part. There are also five mini games that includes bowling, swimming, etc. The game was originally released as 'Campus: Sakura no Mau Naka de' for personal computers, before being ported and renamed for the Sony PlayStation home console release.
